Drinks.name: Peppermint Mocha
Drinks.description: A blend of espresso, steamed milk, peppermint-flavored syrup and mocha sauce gets topped with whipped cream and dark-chocolate curls.

Drinks.name: Irish Cream Cold Brew
Drinks.description: Starbucks® Cold Brew with Irish cream-flavored syrup is finished with vanilla-flavored sweet cream cold foam and a strike of cocoa powder.

Drinks.name: Iced Sugar Cookie Almondmilk Latte
Drinks.description: Starbucks® Blonde Espresso Roast is blended with sugar cookie flavors and almondmilk on ice. For the finishing touch: red and green sprinkles.

Drinks.name: Caramel Brulée Latte
Drinks.description: Espresso, steamed milk and caramel brulée sauce are finished with whipped cream and a crunchy caramel brulée topping.

Drinks.name: Toasted White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino® blended beverage
Drinks.description: Coffee, milk and ice are blended with caramelized white chocolate flavors and topped with whipped cream and red sugar sparkles.

Drinks.name: Signature Hot Chocolate
Drinks.description: A holiday classic with steamed milk, whipped cream and chocolaty drizzle.

Drinks.name: Apple Crisp Oatmilk Macchiato
Drinks.description: Layered flavors of apple, cinnamon, oats and brown sugar combine in harmony with Starbucks® Blonde Espresso, creamy oatmilk and spiced apple drizzle to create a delicious apple crisp you can sip. A nostalgic autumn pick-me-up.

Drinks.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
Drinks.description: Signature espresso and steamed milk with the celebrated flavor combination of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove. Enjoy it topped with whipped cream and real pumpkin-pie spices.

Drinks.name: Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew
Drinks.description: Starbucks® Cold Brew sweetened with vanilla syrup and topped with a pumpkin cream cold foam and a dusting of pumpkin spice topping.

Drinks.name: Caramel Apple Spice
Drinks.description: Steamed apple juice complemented with cinnamon syrup, whipped cream and a caramel sauce drizzle.

Drinks.name: Chai Tea Latte
Drinks.description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove and other warming spices is combined with steamed milk and topped with foam for the perfect balance of sweet and spicy. An iconic chai cup.

Drinks.name: Pumpkin Spice Macchiato
Drinks.description: A secret menu. A fantastic pairing of Iced Caramel Macchiato and pumpkin sauce! A hidden gem, indeed.

Drinks.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
Drinks.description: We add freshly steamed milk and cinnamon dolce-flavored syrup to our classic espresso, topped with sweetened whipped cream and a cinnamon dolce topping to bring you specialness in a treat.

Drinks.name: Pumpkin Spice Flat White
Drinks.description: A perfect mix and match of fall and winter! A heartwarming mixture of a classic flat white with pumpkin spice to add a taste of autumn.
